group_1.narration: Dear Rabi:@I will be hosting a Halloween party at my place...@Well, Papa has other matters to attend to,@so the participants will be just me and Mikage.@Bring some candy and let's make it a fun gathering!

group_1.textCenter: (...This message was sent a little while ago.)
(I was struggling with what to pick for@my costume, but...)

group_1.textRight: I see, you'd like me to make a costume that@only exists in your memory...
In that case, leave it to me and Hagumu!♪

group_1.textCenter: (Thanks to Sasha and the others, I was able to@resolve that issue.)
(Plus, I was able to prepare sweets that both@of them will like.)
I'm sure Mikage and Nayuta will be pleased...

group_1.narration: "Hello, the door is open,@so please wait in the living room!"

group_1.textCenter: (...Are they still putting their costumes on?)
...I wonder what kind of outfits they'll wear.

group_1.narration: I'm sure Mikage would look@adorable and stunning in anything...
And for Nayuta…maybe something cute?@A more mature style would fit her better…@No, that wouldn't match her personality…

group_1.textCenter: Whatever they wear, I'm looking forward to it...

group_1.textRight: Sorry to keep you waiting!
Here we are, Rabitan!
Woooow! You look so cute!

group_1.textLeft: It suits you perfectly!@It's so fluffy and fluttery!
Why are you both…wearing your school@uniforms?

group_1.textRight: Well, this is a candy-snacking party, right?
I brought looots of snacks! *Giggle*

group_1.textLeft: I was looking forward to that...but...

group_1.textRight: Oh, since I said it was a Halloween party you@thought we would all be in costume…

group_1.textLeft: U…Ugh...

group_1.textRight: Rabitan?! What's wrong?!

group_1.textLeft: How embarrassing... I seem to be the only one@who went the extra mile...

group_1.textRight: But it really suits you, Rabi!
So, you don't need to be so embarrassed...

group_1.textLeft: ...Moving on!

group_1.textRight: [chara:103701:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Y-Yes!

group_1.textLeft: Nayuta, I believe there was a MAJOR issue@with your wording!
When you mention a Halloween party,@one assumes costumes will be worn...
If costumes weren't required, you should've@mentioned that!

group_1.textRight: I-I'm sorry!
Rabitan, you seem really angry…@Are you never gonna forgive Nayutan?

group_1.textLeft: Huh?! That would be terrible!

group_1.textRight: Uh, um... I'll do anything, so…@Please forgive me!

group_1.textLeft: ...Nayuta, let me give you some advice@for the future.
One shouldn't propose terms that puts them@at a significant disadvantage in negotiations.

group_1.textRight: Then, should I withdraw...?

group_1.textLeft: No, it's too late now.@You said you would do anything.

group_1.textRight: That...has its limits.
Rabitan, what are you going to make her do?

group_1.textLeft: Nayuta will wear a cute outfit of my choosing.
As…her costume for Halloween.

group_1.textRight: HUH?! Just what are you going to make@me wear?!

group_1.textLeft: Hmm... I'm still thinking about it.@I'll consult with the professor.

group_1.textRight: Eeehhh? Nayutan's getting special treatment?!@I want a costume tooooo!

group_1.textLeft: Of course, I was planning to have one made@for you as well, Mikage.

group_1.textRight: [chara:103801:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Yay!

group_1.textLeft: ...Now, what kind of costume should it be?

group_1.textRight: I want one with kitty ears!@And a red hood would be nice too!
And for Nayutan… It would be nice to have her@try a miniskirt once in a while!

group_1.textLeft: I think the professor will oppose that...@How about something with pants?

group_1.textRight: *Chuckle*

group_1.textLeft: ...What are you laughing at?@You're doomed.

group_1.textRight: That's not it. It's simply that I got to witness@many different sides of you today.
Embarrassed, angry, happy...@You can wear many expressions.

group_1.textLeft: ...I'm naturally expressive.@What are you trying to say...?

group_1.textRight: You're saying it with THAT face?!

group_1.textLeft: If you're going to tease me, I'll make you@wear a silly-looking outfit.

group_1.textCenter: Rabitan and Nayutan are so chummy today.@*Giggle*
Heeeey, let me join in on the fun!

group_1.textLeft: What's inside this fluttery costume?
Wait! Mikage...?!
Hey, that tickles!
*Giggle*
